Dear Mr. Underwood:
I
We were most pleased to hear that our program BRITAIN VIEWS
THE UNITED NATIONS will be distributed on September 24. Your decision
to wait for the fall term was a good idea and will undoubtedly ensure better
coverage.
At the present time, we are preparing a second program LATIN
AMERICA VIEWS THE UNITED NATIONS based on two new books in the
same series, Mexico and the United Nations and Uruguay and the United
Nations. There is a good chance that the heads of the United Nations
delegations of Mexico and Uruguay will participate. I will keep you inÂ¬
formed as to further developments.
Thanks for your cooperation.
Director of Public Relations
Mr. Robert E. Underwood, Jr.
